body:
Yup. It's true. I feel like i gotta go.

Reason 1: PVP is so bad I cant have fun(my fault)
My pvp skills have dropped from 50/200 to -1/200. I guess it's because of the new maps that im not used to. This one is 100% my fault.

Reason 2: B-B-B.....Bored.
Not much to explain. I ain't digging the new maps and stuff.

Reason 3: Friends.
It's either they dont remember me, they don't like me anymore, or they /hub right when I say hi (its kinda funny lol) i feel many friends i had in the past dont remember me/care about me anymore.

Thanks, Avicus! For all the fun.

title: Leaving/break? (NOT decided)

replies.body:
Well I am in the process of taking a break from playing minecraft altogether :/ I have gone 9 days and have 6 days to go. I too was getting slightly bored, but now i can't wait to return!

It's hard work, but i recommend a break; it'll do you some good. ;)
replies.body_tagged:
Well I am in the process of taking a break from playing minecraft altogether :/ I have gone 9 days and have 6 days to go. I too was getting slightly bored, but now i can't wait to return!

It's hard work, but i recommend a break; it'll do you some good. ;)

replies.body:
NO, don't leave. It doesn't matter if your good at PVP or not, it matters on if your having fun and experiencing new thrills.
Bored? New maps are out and new mini games, try to enjoy them. Give them a chance and you'll see what happens. 
And you have tons of friends and we all motivate you to stay!
replies.body_tagged:
NO, don't leave. It doesn't matter if your good at PVP or not, it matters on if your having fun and experiencing new thrills.
Bored? New maps are out and new mini games, try to enjoy them. Give them a chance and you'll see what happens. 
And you have tons of friends and we all motivate you to stay!

replies.body: Yeah, Slicorn. :/ my brain is like sliced into halves...1 says to take break the other says to stay. This is some hard crap to deal with .__.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, Slicorn. :/ my brain is like sliced into halves...1 says to take break the other says to stay. This is some hard crap to deal with .__.

replies.body: well remember, it doesn't have to be a long break.  You could just take a week break, and then decide on what to do ;)

replies.body: Yeah, nuke you have great experiences ant this server and you shall remember them all, you have come far and i do understand your break complaint.

replies.body:
Im really sorry for the negativity, But if you have not decided on whether you are going, why create a post? Fishy did take a break from minecraft and did not need to make a post about it. 
Its a moral decision and its entirely up to you. Maybe create a post on how to make yourself more productive while playing? But please make up your mind first 
Thank you!

replies.body: Sorry, yoav. I made this post because i was pretty sure id be takin a break. So i wrote this to tell the people who are still my friends whats cooking. And btw, i AM taking a break :)
